1032769707747803138.text:
Two weeks ago, my dad passed away.

I gave his eulogy a week ago.

What we talked about most often were the stars.  How insignificant we are.  How vast the universe is.  And how beautiful the stars are.

Be humble. Be kind. And fight for what you believe in.
